info: reconstructed hit info from L/R FTOF PMTs

items.name: energy_left_unc
items.info: E dep unc (MeV) from L PMT

items.name: energy_right_unc
items.info: E dep unc (MeV) from R PMT

items.name: time_left_unc
items.info: Hit time unc (ns) from L PMT

items.name: time_right_unc
items.info: Hit time unc (ns) from R PMT

items.name: x_unc
items.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: y_unc
items.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: z_unc
items.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: tx
items.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: ty
items.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: tz
items.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: adc_idx1
items.info: index of hit with ADCL in adc bank, starts at zero

items.name: adc_idx2
items.info: index of hit with ADCR in adc bank, starts at zero

items.name: tdc_idx1
items.info: index of hit with TDCL in tdc bank, starts at zero

items.name: tdc_idx2
items.info: index of hit with TDCR in tdc bank, starts at zero

items.name: pathLength
items.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

items.name: pathLengthThruBar
items.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

items.name: x_unc
items.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: y_unc
items.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: z_unc
items.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

items.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: tz
items.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: adc_idx1
items.info: index of hit with ADCL in adc bank, starts at zero

items.name: adc_idx2
items.info: index of hit with ADCR in adc bank, starts at zero

items.name: tdc_idx1
items.info: index of hit with TDCL in tdc bank, starts at zero

items.name: tdc_idx2
items.info: index of hit with TDCR in tdc bank, starts at zero

items.name: pathLength
items.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

items.name: pathLengthThruBar
items.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

items.name: component
items.info: paddle id of FTOF hit with lowest paddle id in cluster

items.name: energy_unc
items.info: E dep unc (MeV) of the cluster

items.name: x
items.info: Global X coor (cm) of cluster hit

items.name: y
items.info: Global Y coor (cm) of cluster hit

items.name: z
items.info: Global Z coor (cm) of cluster hit

items.name: x_unc
items.info: Global X coor unc (cm)  of cluster hit

items.name: y_unc
items.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of cluster hit

items.name: z_unc
items.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of cluster hit

items.name: paddle_id1A
items.info: paddle id of hit with lowest paddle id in cluster for panel 1A

items.name: paddle_id1B
items.info: paddle id of hit with lowest paddle id in cluster for panel 1B

items.name: tminAlgo_1B_tCorr
items.info: corrected hit time using tmin algorithm to compute the path length between 1A and 1B

items.name: midbarAlgo_1B_tCorr
items.info: corrected hit time using middle of bar algorithm to compute the path length between 1A and 1B

items.name: EmaxAlgo_1B_tCorr
items.info: corrected hit time using Emax algorithm to compute the path length between 1A and 1B
